name: SW Video SiteMap
author: Ryan Folstad

sections.description:
This plugin generates a video sitemap of posts in a given category. Use the settings to identify which categories, what custom fields contain your videos and what filename you would like to use.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

<?php code(); // goes in backticks ?>
sections.installation: Once added to wordpress and activated, goto the settings and identify the categories you mark posts that contain videos. You must add some custom fields to the posts to allow the sitemap to be generated.
